name: part_000
file: tmp_【Birthdayお披露目】かわいいけどかっこいいを目指していくヴァ！！【#ときのそら生誕祭ライブ 】 [AtbVQjUesq4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Wait screen and opening intro animation.
Tokino Sora performs "oath sign" on stage.
Tokino Sora addresses the audience after the first song.

subtitles.original: oath sign 作詞・作曲 渡辺翔
subtitles.english: oath sign Lyrics & Composition by Sho Watanabe

subtitles.original: 繰り返す世界 何度手を伸ばしたら
subtitles.english: How many times must I reach out to this repeating world?

subtitles.original: 儚い涙は黒い心溶かすの
subtitles.english: Will these fleeting tears melt my black heart?

subtitles.original: 芽生え出した思いが胸に響いたなら
subtitles.english: If these budding feelings resonate within my chest,

subtitles.original: 君の隣でずっと変わらず守るだろう
subtitles.english: I will protect you forever by your side.

subtitles.original: 堕ちた希望を拾って 明日に繋いでゆけば
subtitles.english: If I pick up the fallen hope and connect it to tomorrow,

subtitles.original: 絡まった歪な願いだってほどける
subtitles.english: Even the tangled, distorted wishes will unravel.

subtitles.original: 光をかざして 躊躇いを消した
subtitles.english: I held up the light and banished my hesitation.

subtitles.original: あげたかったのは未来で
subtitles.english: What I wanted to give you was the future,

subtitles.original: 泣いてる夜抱いたまま 嘆きを叫んで
subtitles.english: holding the crying night and screaming my grief.

subtitles.original: 踏み出した足音 その向こう側へ そっと消してゆく
subtitles.english: The footsteps I take, I'll gently erase them toward the other side.

subtitles.original: 確かな絆を強く握り進もう どこまでも
subtitles.english: Let's move forward, gripping our certain bond tightly, wherever we go.

subtitles.original: 汚れきった奇跡を背に
subtitles.english: With the dirtied miracle behind us.

subtitles.original: 作られた思い 触れれば何よりも
subtitles.english: The fabricated feelings, if I touch them, they are more than anything...

subtitles.original: 温かくて現実が霞み始める
subtitles.english: warm, and reality begins to haze.

subtitles.original: 震え出した世界に 問いかけ続けても
subtitles.english: Even if I keep questioning this trembling world,

subtitles.original: 答えなんて出ないって もう君は知っていたの
subtitles.english: you already knew that no answer would come.

subtitles.original: 泣いて滲んだ願いは 決して揺るがしはしなくて
subtitles.english: The wishes blurred by tears will never be shaken,

subtitles.original: ただそっと痛みを終りなく与える
subtitles.english: only gently giving endless pain.

subtitles.original: 悲しみを知って 喜びを知った
subtitles.english: Knowing sadness, knowing joy,

subtitles.original: 強さは君を 変えて立ち止まった時果て
subtitles.english: strength changed you, and when you stood still, at the end of time,

subtitles.original: 全てを壊した 届くはずのない言葉を託して
subtitles.english: everything was destroyed, entrusting words that should never reach.

subtitles.original: 見えた瞳は何を感じて遠ざける心 隠すように
subtitles.english: What do those eyes feel, as if hiding a heart that pushes away?

subtitles.original: 今ここにいる意味 教えてくれたのなら
subtitles.english: If you've taught me the meaning of being here now,

subtitles.original: 強く居られる 変わらずいつも
subtitles.english: I can be strong, as always.

subtitles.original: みんなー！今日は見に来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Thank you for coming to see me today!
